data.name: eggboy
data.detailed_description:
"EGG BOY" is a challenging casual shooting game where you will fight against bunnies and rush through levels through a variety of bizarre challenges.

" EGG BOY " is a parkour fighting game based on cute cartoon style, including both single and multiplayer modes. Dozens of party levels, hundreds of different types of EGG BOYs to choose from, rich and interesting activity modes to participate in.

Simple operation and easy to use, move freely on the field, rush to the finish line, be careful with your feet, don't fall to the bottom, you will be in danger!
Incarnate as Egg Boy, and rush through the single-plank bridge, floating island, rabbit paradise and other levels by yourself. There will be many dangers on the way forward. Players need to ensure that they are walking on the right path, and find the Egg that represents victory to win.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit/Windows 8 64-bit/Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Inter Core i5/AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit/Windows 8 64-bit/Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Inter Core i5/AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
